pages.text: This chapter will teach you about the optional techniques you can use to build advanced $(thing)Timber Frames$() patterns.$(br2)These can be enabled in $(thing)Broad Knife$() config by pressing $(thing)H$() while holding the tool.

pages.heading: Variant Placement
pages.text: Using this mode, $(thing)right-click$() will change both the variant and the pattern of the block.

pages.heading: Isolation Blocks
pages.text: Enabling this adds a third variant that only connects to itself.
